headline: Palo Alto Networks (PANW) Price Target Trimmed to $204 Despite Positive CyberArk Outlook
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the Hot AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. On August 6, Bernstein SocGen Group analyst Peter Weed lowered the price target on the stock to $204.00 (from $225.00) while maintaining an Outperform rating. The firm reviewed the $25b CyberArk acquisition and ultimately views it positively despite intial negative […]
